mstns:Data_Provider_Contact_Details.mstns:Name: Ulrich Brose
mstns:Data_Provider_Contact_Details.mstns:Affiliation: German Centre for Integrative Biodiversity Research (iDiv) Halle-Jena-Leipzig

mstns:Dataset.mstns:Project_or_Workshop_or_Thesis_Titl: Predator traits determine food-web architecture across ecosystem
mstns:Dataset.mstns:Dataset_Title: GlobAL daTabasE of traits and food Web Architecture (GATEWAy) version 1.0
mstns:Dataset.mstns:Short_Abstract: GATEWAy contains global set of complex food webs with species traits such as body masses, metabolic types, movement types and ecosystem types
mstns:Dataset.mstns:Keywords: food webs, species traits, body masses
